content:
That sounds great! I'm impressed by the program's career services and support. I think it's really important to have a strong network and resources to help you achieve your career goals. Since I'm in my 30s, I'm definitely looking for a program that can help me advance in my marketing career and provide a good return on investment.

Speaking of investment, can you tell me more about the tuition and fees for the program? I'd also like to know if there are any scholarships or financial aid options available.
